name: ipfs-boot
description: Publish IPFS webapps which require user consent to update

scripts.copy: cp -R index.html assets dist/ && mv dist/assets/nitro_wasm* dist/ && mv dist/assets/_redirects dist/_redirects
scripts.sworker: npm run cjs && browserify src/sw.js -o dist/sw.js
scripts.build: npm run sworker && browserify src/index.js -o dist/bundle.js && npm run mini && npm run copy
scripts.dev: npm run build && bhr src/index.js index.html assets/ -o dist/bundle.js
